1593791342_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body: Why do you think ISIS is a terrorist organization? The criteria for judging are all in the hands of the West, and the so-called democracy is so ridiculous in America today. I can't breathe! China does have many problems, but China cannot tolerate falun Gong, which is a cult.
